UEFA Champions League.passage: The UEFA Champions League is an annual continental club football competition organised by the Union of European Football Associations (UEFA) since 1955. It is the most prestigious and lucrative of UEFA's club competitions, providing qualification to the UEFA Super Cup and the FIFA Club World Cup.
